Description.Name: SRM Ammo (Inferno)
Description.Details: The Firebee's internal Inferno SRM Ammo Bin contains 30 rounds and may feed multiple weapons. This ammo bin is small enough that it can share its location with another component. Infernos are special fuel-air missile munitions that combine flammable chemicals with an adhesive compound to shower their targets with a burning gel. This gel is designed to increase a 'Mech's heat levels to the point where it shuts down the 'Mech's Fusion Engine. Inferno SRMs deal very little damage but for every missile that strikes the target increase its heat level by 4 points. Inferno ammo bins explode violently when destroyed. Ammunition type can be changed by clicking the middle of the weapons activation panel during combat if more than one type of ammunition is present. Explosion damage per ammo: 0.8 Heat damage per ammo: 1
